curam.util.resources

Class TraceLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.AbstractLogger
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Logger
        • curam.util.resources.TraceLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger, org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ExtendedLogger, org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LocationAwareLogger, org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Supplier<org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.LoggerConfig>

    public class TraceLogger
extends org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Logger
    This class extends the Log4 Logger without providing any extra functionality. It exists to allow changes to be made in the future without any direct impact on code that uses the Trace class.
    See Also:
